effect.short: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavorTexts.text:
The user drains the target’s energy with its horns.
The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.
